title: Confusing out-of-space error
body:
.While trying to replicate #1000 I tried on current master:

```
..atasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000001 (git)-[master] % datalad get sub-01/anat/sub-01_T1w.nii.gz
2016-10-13 19:55:10,295 [INFO   ] Found 1 datasets to operate on. 
2016-10-13 19:55:10,309 [INFO   ] Getting 1 file/dir(s) of dataset <Dataset path=/tmp/datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000001> ... 
2016-10-13 19:55:10,309 [INFO   ] Obtaining information on what files need to be obtained 
Total (0 ok, 1 failed out of 1)  0%|                                                                                                     | 0.00/5.66M [00:00<?, ?B/s]2016-10-13 19:55:11,636 [ERROR  ] OutOfSpaceError: command 'annex get' needs 160.82 MB more [annexrepo.py:_run_annex_command_json:1092] (OutOfSpaceError) 
```

(scroll all the way to the right!)

but

```
% df -h
Filesystem                                   Size  Used Avail Use% Mounted on
udev                                         3,8G     0  3,8G   0% /dev
tmpfs                                        769M   28M  742M   4% /run
/dev/sda1                                     37G   33G  2,2G  94% /
tmpfs                                        3,8G   38M  3,8G   1% /dev/shm
tmpfs                                        5,0M  4,0K  5,0M   1% /run/lock
tmpfs                                        3,8G     0  3,8G   0% /sys/fs/cgroup
/dev/sda6                                    175G  140G   33G  82% /home
tmpfs                                        769M   24K  769M   1% /run/user/113
tmpfs                                        769M   28K  769M   1% /run/user/1000
```
